nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Spatial rift ahead. Lightning within the void seam. Instruments drift out of calibration every few seconds.

choices.text: Study the anomaly from a safe distance.
Bypass. No reason to tempt fate.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Waveforms suggest a repeating failure pattern in gate harmonics. Mapping a safer corridor around similar seams.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Course offset by 0.7 AU. We’ll lose time, but avoid the shear.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Your presence damped the spike. The rift ‘looked’ away. That shouldn’t be possible.
